info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 12 at 12:14PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Aransas, northeastern San Patricio and south central Refugio Counties through 1245 PM CDT... At 1213 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bayside, or 11 miles northeast of Taft, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rockport, Lamar, Bayside, Quintana, Bonnie View, Holiday Beach, Copano Village and Fulton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
